remarks: Relationship between division and multiplication.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Feb-1995.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Feb-2014.)
statement:
divclz.1 $e |- A e. CC $.
divclz.2 $e |- B e. CC $.
divmulz.3 $e |- C e. CC $.
divmul.4 $e |- B =/= 0 $.
divmuli $p |- ( ( A / B ) = C <-> ( B x. C ) = A ) $.
